verse: On the 21st day of the 7th month, the prophet Haggai gave another message from the Eternal.
On the 24th day of the 9th month during the 2nd year of King Dariusâ€™ reign, the prophet Haggai received a third message from the Eternal One.
The Eternal, Commander of heavenly armies, told Haggai to ask the priests to explain what the law says about this scenario:
That same day the prophet Haggai received a second message from the Eternal One.
